name: Heart Attack (itch) (padieter)
description:
Your body kicks into overdrive as you hack 'n' slash through enemies and collect blood cells to increase the blood flow to the heart.

Controls

W,A,S,D = Move

Space Bar = Jump

Left Mouse = Attack

Features
  • Colorful graphics
  • Fast-paced action
  • Quick and addictive
  • Suspenseful soundtrack
